name: Conveo
headline: Qualitative Research Conducted and Analyzed by AI
description: Conveo is an AI-powered platform for conducting and analyzing qualitative research through in-depth video and voice interviews. We help marketing, insights, product, and design teams gather customer insights 100x faster and at a fraction of the cost.

founders.name: Dieter De Mesmaeker, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CTO @Conveo.ai, previously Co-Founder & CTO @Datacamp.com (+$60m ARR)

founders.name: Hendrik Van Hove, Founder
founders.description:
Belgian, 26, passionate about tech and (kite-) surfing.
Building Conveo.ai, qualitative research at scale with AI interviews and analysis.
Worked at McKinsey in tech/AI and private equity projects. Background in finance with internships at Morgan Stanley (IBD), Lazard (IBD), PE.
MSc Business Engineering and MSc Artificial Intelligence (majority coursework, did not graduate).

# The World’s Most Powerful Qualitative Insights Platform
Conveo is a qualitative research platform that conducts and analyzes in-depth, AI-moderated voice & video interviews. By merging the depth of qualitative interviews with the scale of a survey, we provide deeper insights, blazingly fast.
[See a Demo](https://conveo.ai/<https:/calendly.com/hendrik-conveo/30min>)
![Unilever](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto/v1/logos/b5zrtfjcwpt07z6av28u)![AB InBev](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto/v1/logos/vq27qk8tbg5pwslgcqra)![Proximus](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto/v1/logos/qrfotf5t919iowxklutr)![KBC](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto/v1/logos/glwhm0hdn7iw4go1q462)![Causeway Solutions](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto/v1/logos/xlxtwf2dm8d8dlke7iwv)![The House of Marketing](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto/v1/logos/pqqyledtyeuetjll32fx)![ProNails](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto/v1/logos/jtvuqoc33vin906ok1m6)![1440 Foods](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto/v1/logos/wxktl1xp2asetm1oc0as)
Scroll down
## Unleash the Power of AI-Enabled Qualitative Insights
Previous slideNext slide
## The Next Frontier of Qualitative Insights
### Unprecedented Speed
Conduct and analyze hundreds of video interviews simultaneously, delivering insights instantly. This rapid turnaround accelerates decision-making and keeps your strategy and processes agile.
### Massive Scale
Conduct and analyze interviews with large samples, unbound by physical constraints, to deliver robust insights.
### Cost Efficient
Achieve high-quality insights at a fraction of the cost through automated moderation, analysis, and reporting. Our platform meets your budget and margin constraints effectively.
### Human-Like Depth
Voice and video elicits authentic and in the moment reactions. The power of AI uncovers the unknown in multi-modal unstructured data which traditional methods and human analysis might miss.
## Who’s It For
### In-House Organizations
Insights teams, innovation or R&D departments, CX teams, and product teams can equip themselves with our advanced AI capability for self-conducted research to drive impactful insights and innovation.
### Agencies
Market research companies, creative and innovation agencies, and consulting firms can leverage our cutting-edge technology to deliver superior services to clients.
## Use Cases
### Marketing
Test advertising concepts, brand messaging, and customer perceptions.
### Product Management
Understand user behavior, feedback on new features, and reasons behind churn or dissatisfaction.
### User Research
Conduct deep-dive usability testing and understand user behaviors and pain points through open-ended discussions.
### Customer Insights/Consumer Insights
Obtain holistic consumer understanding to drive strategic decisions.
## How It Works
1Design Your Study
Upload your interview guide or state your research objective and let our AI research copilot create an interview guide for you.
2Share with Participants
Bring your own participants or recruit your panel within Conveo.
3Engage with Users
Let our conversational AI interviewer moderate hundreds of voice and video conversations for you.
4Get Actionable Insights
Watch the AI interviewer dig deep with participants, analyze it, and translate it into actionable insights for you.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/df3occ1ro/image/upload/f_jpg/gradients/how-it-works-1.jpg)
## The Complete AI Research Platform
### AI Survey Design
Generate the perfect interview guide with our AI market research copilot.
### AI Voice & Video Interviews
Let our AI interviewer conduct voice or video interviews with your target audience.
### Human-Like Conversations
Let our AI interviewer probe deeper to uncover the most valuable insights.
### Multilingual Support
Run interviews in over 50 languages, we’ll translate everything into your language.
### Consumer Panel Integration
Instantly have meaningful conversations with consumers all over the world.
### Multimedia Support
Let respondents react to concepts by uploading images, videos, or clickable mockups.
### Mobile-first
Participants can complete interviews on the go and perform tasks when not behind their desk.
### Share and Socialize
Conveo prepares everything in various formats, enabling you to easily socialize the insights.
### Industry-leading security
Our platform implements best-in-class security controls.
## Start making better decisions today with Conveo
[See a Demo](https://conveo.ai/<https:/calendly.com/hendrik-conveo/30min>)

generated_description:
**Conveo: Revolutionizing Qualitative Research with AI**

Founded in 2024 and hailing from Antwerp, Belgium, Conveo is a cutting-edge platform that leverages artificial intelligence to conduct and analyze qualitative research. Specifically designed for teams in marketing, insights, product, and design, Conveo claims to help organizations gather customer insights **100 times faster** and at a **fraction of the traditional cost**.

### Mission and Vision
At its core, Conveo’s mission is to redefine qualitative research through the intelligent use of AI. By merging in-depth video and voice interviews with powerful analytics, the platform seeks to make qualitative data as accessible and actionable as quantitative analytics.

### What They Offer
Conveo is positioned as a one-stop shop for qualitative insights. Here's what sets it apart:

- **Speed**: Conduct and analyze hundreds of interviews simultaneously, drastically speeding up the data-gathering process.
- **Scale**: Engage with large samples without physical constraints to gather comprehensive insights.
- **Cost-Efficiency**: Automated moderation and analysis mean you can achieve high-quality insights without breaking the bank.
- **Depth**: Using AI to conduct human-like interviews allows for authentic responses and deeper insights that traditional methods might miss.

### User Base
Conveo caters to a diverse clientele:
- **In-House Teams**: Ideal for insights teams, R&D departments, and CX teams looking to drive impactful decisions through self-conducted research.
- **Agencies**: Market research firms and consulting businesses can leverage its advanced technology to enhance their services and deliver superior results to clients.

### Practical Applications
The platform serves an array of use cases:
- **Marketing**: Evaluating ad concepts and customer perceptions.
- **Product Management**: Gaining insights into user behavior and feedback on new features.
- **User Research**: Conducting usability testing and identifying user pain points through open discussions.
- **Consumer Insights**: Helping stakeholders understand their audience on a deeper level.

### How It Works
1. **Design Your Study**: Users can upload an interview guide or let the AI create one tailored to their research objectives.
2. **Engage Participants**: Recruit your own participants or tap into the Conveo panel.
3. **Conduct Interviews**: The AI interviewer manages voice or video conversations.
4. **Access Insights**: Watch as the AI digs deep to analyze the data and deliver actionable insights.

### The Team and Support
With a lean team of just five and guidance from notable figures in the startup ecosystem (like Group Partner Tom Blomfield), Conveo is making a substantial impact in the research sector. Their commitment extends beyond just gathering insights—Conveo ensures industry-leading security and multilingual support, accommodating interviews in over 50 languages.

### Backed by Y Combinator
Being part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Conveo is positioned among some of the most promising early-stage startups, gaining access to invaluable resources and networking opportunities.

In summary, Conveo stands out by combining the depth of qualitative research with the speed and scale typically associated with quantitative methods. If you’re looking to make smarter decisions fueled by qualitative insights, Conveo might just be the platform you need to consider. You can learn more or schedule a demo [here](https://conveo.ai).
